alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 14 at 12:47PM MST until November 16 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ WEDNESDAY TO 8 AM MST /7 AM PST/ THURSDAY ELEVATIONS ABOVE 4500 FEET IN THE CLEARWATER AND BITTERROOT MOUNTAINS... * WHAT...Snow expected Elevations above 4500 feet in the Clearwater and Bitterroot mountains. Total snow accumulations up to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass, Highway 93 Sula to Lost Trail Pass, Lolo Pass, Elk City, and Dixie * WHEN...From 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ Wednesday to 8 AM MST /7 AM PST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
